name: Room of Requirement Specialty Tools
description: Specialty development tools not available in Homebrew: Sema4.AI (action-server v2.14.0, rcc v18.5.0), Dagger CI/CD, container-use MCP. All binaries verified with SHA256 checksums.

installActionServer.description: Install Sema4.AI action-server (v2.14.0) for AI automation

installRcc.description: Install Robocorp RCC (v18.5.0) for automation workflows

installDagger.description: Install Dagger CLI for CI/CD and containerized pipelines

installContainerUse.description: Install container-use MCP for sandboxed development environments
